name: Code for Sending SMS
description: This app has code for sending SMS messages (`sendDataMessage`, `sendMultipartTextMessage` or `sendTextMessage`) that could be a cost for the user if maliciously exploited.
remediation: Carefully check whether the SMS capability is needed for the specific app and remove this code if not the case.

references.text: Further information on the SMS API can be found in the Android Developer Guide [[1]].
